002_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03_SELECT.content: Hacker alert! Chaos in R-Fair City! Power drained from all rides. Must use renewable sources to power up rides and keep R-Fair City running!

014_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03_SELECT.content: This is a wind turbine, wind turns the blades, which creates power.

015_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02_SELECT.content: Hydro power is created when rushing water from rivers and streams spins a turbine. Hydro can create a lot of power.

016_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03_SELECT.content: Solar panels use the energy from the sun to create power.

017_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01a_SELECT.content: Hurry! You're almost out of stars.

019_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01a_SELECT.content: You need more power to start this ride.

020_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02_SELECT.content: Still not enough power. Try a different combination of power sources.

021_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01b_SELECT.content: Too much power is going to this ride. Try a different combination of power sources.

022_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01_SELECT.content: These power sources give more power than you need. Try a different combination or you won't have enough power for the other rides.

023_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01c_SELECT.content: Too much is power connected to this ride.

024_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02_SELECT.content: Game booths are in the way. Find a different path for the power line.

025_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01b_SELECT.content: Good job! This ride is powered up!

026_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02a_SELECT.content: You did it. Look how happy the riders are!

029_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03_SELECT.content: The total power of the sources must equal the power the ride needs.

030_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01b_SELECT.content: Power up the rides to keep R-Fair City running!

031_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01_SELECT.content: Hacker alert! Hacker alert! Hacker alert! Hacker alert!

031_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02_SELECT.content: Hacker alert! Hacker alert! Hacker alert!

032_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02d_SELECT.content: Oh no, Hacker drained more power!

033_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03b_SELECT.content: Hacker disrupted all the power. Everything needs a different number of cyber-watts.

034_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02a_SELECT.content: Time ran out to power the rides. R-Fair City is counting on you. Try again Cyber-Mate!

035_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02b_SELECT.content: You earned one star! Play again and power the rides faster to earn more stars.

038_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02a_SELECT.content: Two stars. Good Job. You powered those rides quickly!

040_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_02a_SELECT.content: You did it! You powered up all the rides. R-Fair City is back in business!

040_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03a_SELECT.content: R-Fair City is back in business!

040_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_03b_SELECT.content: R-Fair City is back in business!

041_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_04b_SELECT.content: Squirt as many objects with water as you can before time runs out.

042_MotherBoard_CYB-WOT_01b_SELECT.content: Time's up! Let's see how you did.

tutorial/step-1.content: Hacker drained the power from all the rides!

tutorial/step-2.content: Use power from renewable sources -- sun, wind and water -- to power the rides back up.

tutorial/step-3.content: The number next to the ride shows how much power it needs. This ride needs 5 cyber-watts!

tutorial/step-4.content: To power the ride, drag from the ride to the power source to connect them. Drag from the ride first.

tutorial/step-6.content: Good job! The ride has power.

tutorial/step-7.content: Some rides will need more than one power source. Drag two power sources next to each other to combine them. But pay attention -- the total power of the sources must equal the power the ride needs.

tutorial/step-8.content: When you see the plus sign, drop the power source to connect it.

tutorial/step-9.content: The power sources are connected! Now drag from the ride to a power source to power up!

tutorial/step-11.content: You can't place power sources on the paths, or run power lines along the paths and rivers. And be careful -- power lines can't go over game booths.

tutorial/step-12.content: Watch out for Hacker! He's still on R-Fair City and can cause more chaos. Good luck Cyber-Mates!

tutorial/step-starbar.content: Power the rides quickly. The star bar will go down over time. The fuller the bar is, the more stars you earn.

tutorial/step-7-1.content: Drag two power sources next to each other to combine them.
